doc.description: Auto Exposure and Auto White Balancing for the Bebop 1 and 2

define.name: BEBOP_AE_AWB_CAMERA
define.description: which camera to run the AWB and AE

define.name: BEBOP_AE_AWB_VERBOSE
define.description: Whether or not to print debug information to the terminal

define.name: BEBOP_AE_EXPOSURE_GAIN
define.description: Gain to apply to autoexposure change

define.name: BEBOP_AE_MIDDLE_INDEX
define.description: Bin index to be considered as the center of the brightness bins

define.name: BEBOP_AE_DARK_IGNORE
define.description: Proportion of dark bins to ignore in the computation of the autoexposure

define.name: BEBOP_AE_BRIGHT_IGNORE
define.description: Proportion of bright bins to ignore in the computation of the autoexposure

define.name: BEBOP_AE_DARK_BINS
define.description: Number of dark bins to consider as dark in the autoexposure

define.name: BEBOP_AE_BRIGHT_BINS
define.description: Number of bright bins to consider as bright in autoexposure

define.name: BEBOP_AWB_GAIN
define.description: Gain to apply to AWB changes

define.name: BEBOP_AWB_GAIN_SCHEDULING
define.description: Activates gain scheduling for the AWB, helps to handle fast changes in brightness

define.name: BEBOP_AWB_GAIN_SCHEDULING_TOLERANCE
define.description: Tolerance around the target exposure outside of which gain scheduling is activated

define.name: BEBOP_AWB_GAIN_SCHEDULING_STEP
define.description: Step size of the AWB gain scheduling correction

define.name: BEBOP_AWB_MIN_GREY_PIXELS
define.description: Minimum number of grey pixels in image, when lower, the AWB is reset
